::Zardus/Panzertron::

Panzertron frowns. His scanners reported another bot near. He shuggs, looking 
back at Zardus.

"I came here for some help," he says, "As you know, our base is one of the 
strongest on the planet."

Zardus nods, "Yes."

"Excellent," the Millitron continues, "Anyways, our faction is rather small, 
and I was wondering if the Alliance would like to join us, or rather ... 
assimilate us into their ranks."

Zardus' eyes widen. He couldn't believe the bot was offering this! The Iron 
Fist? On the side of the Alliance.

"And what would you want in return?" Zardus asks, interested.

"Protection," Panzertron replies, "SImply that. I'll give you the acces codes 
and everything. You'll be able to controll the ship."

Zardus chuckles. "Excellent. Let's go to your ship, then."

Panzertron nods, transforming into his tank mode and driving back toward the 
shuttle in which he came.

Zardus activates his comm-link, "Gotron, Desmodus, return to base. I will be 
there shortly. We might be moving soon."

With that, Zardus transforms into beast mode, flying off after Panzertron.
